vulnerability_location.description: Both functions are public with no authorization checks or modifiers, allowing any user to trigger payouts or withdraw leftover funds.
Low-level send calls whose return values are not checked, which may silently fail
External calls using .send are not checked for success; if the call fails, funds remain locked and the contract state may still mark payouts as done, causing denial of service
Floating pragma (^0.4.18) allows inconsistent compiler behavior; low-level .send calls at lines 20 and 27 have unchecked return values, which can lead to silent failures and locked funds.
